SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.controller

Class JobAdController

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.controller.JobAdController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/job-ads") public class JobAdController extends Object
Controller class for handling job ads-related operations such as listing, filtering, and viewing job ad details.

      @Autowired public JobAdController(JobAdService jobAdService)

  • Method Details

    • getAllJobAds

      @GetMapping public String getAllJobAds(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a paginated list of job ads.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number to display, defaults to 0.
      size - The number of items per page, defaults to 10.
      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      View name for the list of job advertisements.

    • getFilteredJobAds

      @GetMapping("/filter") public String getFilteredJobAds(@RequestParam(required=false) Seniority seniority, @RequestParam(required=false) String city, @RequestParam(required=false) String mainTechStack, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="1900-01-01") LocalDate date, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Filters job ads based on criteria such as seniority, city, posted date and tech stack.
      Parameters:
      seniority - the seniority level to filter by (e.g., JUNIOR, MID_LEVEL, SENIOR); optional.
      city - the city to filter by; optional.
      mainTechStack - the main tech stack to filter by; optional.
      date - the date to filter jobs posted on or after; optional.
      page - the current page index for pagination; defaults to 0.
      size - the number of job ads per page; defaults to 10 if not specified.
      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      View html file for the filtered list of job ads.

    • getJobAdDetails

      @GetMapping("/{jobAdId}") public String getJobAdDetails(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long jobAdId)
      Displays details for a specific job ad.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      jobAdId - The ID of the job ad to display.
      Returns:
      View Html file for the job ad details.
